REGISTER_SUCCESSFUL: Registration was successful. Welcome to the platform!
EMPTY_OR_INVALID_TOKEN: The token provided is empty or invalid. Please log in again.
INVALID_EMAIL: The email address provided is invalid. Please enter a valid email.
INVALID_LASTNAME: The last name provided is invalid. Please ensure it contains valid characters.
INVALID_FIRSTNAME: The first name provided is invalid. Please ensure it contains valid characters.
INVALID_USERNAME: The username provided is invalid. Please ensure it meets the required format.
INVALID_PASSWORD: The password provided is invalid. Please ensure it up to 8 characters long.
INVALID_EMAIL_OR_PASSWORD: The email or password entered is incorrect. Please try again.
EMAIL_ALREADY_EXISTS: The email address is already registered. Please use a different email or log in.
USERNAME_ALREADY_EXISTS: The username already exists. Please use a different username.
INTERNAL_SERVER_ERROR: Something went wrong, Please try again later.
